name: LIST-ALL
code:
LIST-ALL.                                                        
                EXEC SQL OPEN CUR1 END-EXEC.                            
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'OPEN CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR1 INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.     
                PERFORM PRINT-AND-GET1                                  
                     UNTIL SQLCODE IS NOT EQUAL TO ZERO.                
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 100 THEN
                   MOVE 'FETCH CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL CLOSE CUR1   END-EXEC.                         
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'CLOSE CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                .

name: PRINT-A-LINE
code:
PRINT-A-LINE.                                                    
                MOVE  ACCT-NO      TO  ACCT-NO-O.                       
                MOVE  ACCT-LIMIT   TO  ACCT-LIMIT-O.                    
                MOVE  ACCT-BALANCE TO  ACCT-BALANCE-O.                  
                MOVE  ACCT-LASTN   TO  ACCT-LASTN-O.                    
                MOVE  ACCT-FIRSTN  TO  ACCT-FIRSTN-O.                   
                MOVE  ACCT-COMMENT TO  ACCT-COMMENT-O.                  
                WRITE REPREC AFTER ADVANCING 2 LINES.

name: PRINT-AND-GET1
code: PRINT-AND-GET1.                                                  \n                PERFORM PRINT-A-LINE.                                   \n                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR1 INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.

name: PROG-END
code:
PROG-END.                                                        
                CLOSE REPOUT.                                           
                GOBACK.

name: PROG-START
code: PROG-START.                                                      \n                OPEN OUTPUT REPOUT.                                     \n                PERFORM LIST-ALL.

name: SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
code:
SQL-ERROR-HANDLING.
           DISPLAY 'ERROR AT ' FUNCTION TRIM(UD-ERROR-MESSAGE, TRAILING)
           CALL 'DSNTIAR' USING SQLCA ERROR-MESSAGE ERROR-TEXT-LEN.
           PERFORM VARYING ERROR-INDEX FROM 1 BY 1
                     UNTIL ERROR-INDEX > ERROR-TEXT-HBOUND
                        OR ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX) = SPACES
              DISPLAY FUNCTION TRIM(ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX), TRAILING)
           END-PERFORM
           IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 AND SQLCODE NOT = 100
              MOVE 1000 TO RETURN-CODE
              STOP RUN
           END-IF
           .

code: PROCEDURE DIVISION.

name: GET-ALL
code:
GET-ALL.                                                         
                EXEC SQL OPEN CUR1  END-EXEC.                           
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'OPEN CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR1  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.    
                PERFORM PRINT-ALL                                    
                     UNTIL SQLCODE IS NOT EQUAL TO ZERO.                
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 100 THEN
                   MOVE 'FETCH CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL CLOSE CUR1  END-EXEC.                          
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'CLOSE CUR1' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                .

name: GET-SPECIFIC
code:
GET-SPECIFIC.                                                    
                EXEC SQL OPEN  CUR2  END-EXEC.                          
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'OPEN CUR2' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR2  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.    
                PERFORM PRINT-SPECIFIC                               
                     UNTIL SQLCODE IS NOT EQUAL TO ZERO.                
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 100 THEN
                   MOVE 'FETCH CUR2' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                EXEC SQL CLOSE CUR2  END-EXEC.                          
                IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 THEN
                   MOVE 'CLOSE CUR2' TO UD-ERROR-MESSAGE
                   PERFORM SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
                END-IF
                .

name: PRINT-A-LINE
code:
PRINT-A-LINE.                                                    
                MOVE  ACCT-NO      TO  ACCT-NO-O.                       
                MOVE  ACCT-LIMIT   TO  ACCT-LIMIT-O.                    
                MOVE  ACCT-BALANCE TO  ACCT-BALANCE-O.                  
                MOVE  ACCT-LASTN   TO  ACCT-LASTN-O.                    
                MOVE  ACCT-FIRSTN  TO  ACCT-FIRSTN-O.                   
                MOVE  ACCT-COMMENT TO  ACCT-COMMENT-O.                  
                WRITE REPREC AFTER ADVANCING 2 LINES.

name: PRINT-ALL
code:
PRINT-ALL.                                                       
                PERFORM PRINT-A-LINE.                                   
                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR1  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.

name: PRINT-SPECIFIC
code:
PRINT-SPECIFIC.                                                  
                PERFORM PRINT-A-LINE.                                   
                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR2  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.

name: PROCESS-INPUT
code:
PROCESS-INPUT.                                                   
                IF LNAME = '*'                                          
                   PERFORM GET-ALL                                      
                ELSE                                                    
                   PERFORM GET-SPECIFIC.                                
                READ RECIN  RECORD INTO IOAREA                          
                   AT END SET NOMORE-INPUT TO TRUE.

name: PROG-END
code:
PROG-END.                                                        
                CLOSE RECIN                                             
                      REPOUT.                                           
                GOBACK.

name: PROG-START
code:
PROG-START.                                                      
                OPEN INPUT  RECIN.                                      
                OPEN OUTPUT REPOUT.                                     
                READ RECIN  RECORD INTO IOAREA                          
                   AT END SET NOMORE-INPUT TO TRUE.
                PERFORM PROCESS-INPUT                                   
                   UNTIL NOMORE-INPUT.

name: SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
code:
SQL-ERROR-HANDLING.
           DISPLAY 'ERROR AT ' FUNCTION TRIM(UD-ERROR-MESSAGE, TRAILING)
           CALL 'DSNTIAR' USING SQLCA ERROR-MESSAGE ERROR-TEXT-LEN.
           PERFORM VARYING ERROR-INDEX FROM 1 BY 1
                     UNTIL ERROR-INDEX > ERROR-TEXT-HBOUND
                        OR ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX) = SPACES
              DISPLAY FUNCTION TRIM(ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX), TRAILING)
           END-PERFORM
           IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 AND SQLCODE NOT = 100
              MOVE 1000 TO RETURN-CODE
              STOP RUN
           END-IF
           .

name: PRINT-A-LINE
code:
PRINT-A-LINE.                                                    
                MOVE  ACCT-NO      TO  ACCT-NO-O.                       
                MOVE  ACCT-LASTN   TO  ACCT-LASTN-O.                    
                MOVE  ACCT-FIRSTN  TO  ACCT-FIRSTN-O.                   
                MOVE  ACCT-ADDR3   TO  ACCT-ADDR3-O.                    
                WRITE REPREC AFTER ADVANCING 2 LINES.

name: PRINT-ALL
code: PRINT-ALL.                                                       \n                PERFORM PRINT-A-LINE.                                   \n                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR1  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.

name: PRINT-SPECIFIC
code: PRINT-SPECIFIC.                                                  \n                PERFORM PRINT-A-LINE.                                   \n                EXEC SQL FETCH CUR2  INTO :CUSTOMER-RECORD END-EXEC.

name: PROCESS-INPUT
code:
PROCESS-INPUT.                                                   
                IF STATE = '*'                                          
                   PERFORM GET-ALL                                      
                ELSE                                                    
                   PERFORM GET-SPECIFIC.                                
                READ CARDIN RECORD INTO IOAREA                          
                   AT END SET NOMORE-INPUT TO TRUE.

name: PROG-END
code:
PROG-END.                                                        
                CLOSE CARDIN                                            
                      REPOUT.                                           
                GOBACK.

name: PROG-START
code:
PROG-START.                                                      
                OPEN INPUT  CARDIN.                                     
                OPEN OUTPUT REPOUT.                                     
                READ CARDIN RECORD INTO IOAREA                          
                   AT END SET NOMORE-INPUT TO TRUE.
                PERFORM PROCESS-INPUT                                   
                   UNTIL NOMORE-INPUT.

name: SQL-ERROR-HANDLING
code:
SQL-ERROR-HANDLING.
           DISPLAY 'ERROR AT ' FUNCTION TRIM(UD-ERROR-MESSAGE, TRAILING)
           CALL 'DSNTIAR' USING SQLCA ERROR-MESSAGE ERROR-TEXT-LEN.
           PERFORM VARYING ERROR-INDEX FROM 1 BY 1
                     UNTIL ERROR-INDEX > ERROR-TEXT-HBOUND
                        OR ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX) = SPACES
              DISPLAY FUNCTION TRIM(ERROR-TEXT(ERROR-INDEX), TRAILING)
           END-PERFORM
           IF SQLCODE NOT = 0 AND SQLCODE NOT = 100
              MOVE 1000 TO RETURN-CODE
              STOP RUN
           END-IF
           .
